title: Banks told to stay vigilant amid intel on cyberattack threat
description: Apart from continuously checking network activities and server logs to detect malicious intrusions, banks will have to monitor critical payment systems such as SWIFT (the messaging system to confirm cross-border fund transfers), card network (which facilitates card payments), the online local fund transfer frameworks RTGS, NEFT and UPI, the real-time payment system.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
